That's pretty much it. Happened multiple times.

Reproducible: Sometimes

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Hide "menu Bar".
2. Make sure "Navigation Bar" option is checked.
3. Now right click and choose "Tabs on top"
comments.author: oniray09@yahoo.com
